name: Hemmy Core
author: Abileweb

sections.description:
Hemmy Core plugin provides additional features instagram widget, twitter widget, mailchimp widget and post options for Hemmy Theme.

Features of the plugin includes

  • instagram widget
  • twitter widget
  • mailchimp widget
sections.installation:
1. First download the plugin ZIP file from wordpress.org
  2. Log in to your website administrator panel
  3. Go to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard, click “Upload Plugin”
  4. Upload ZIP file by choosing it from your download location
  5. Click Install Now button
  6. Then click Activate the Plugin button.
  7. You can see the plugin installed on WordPress left menu.

short_description: Hemmy Core plugin provides additional features instagram widget, twitter widget, mailchimp widget and post options for Hemmy Theme.
